title: Play Button Stays Grey
body: If I can get the help I need, will appreciate it. As I select any game, my play button stays grey. I already reinstalled, rebooted the troubleshooting in game options and even tried through what the supporters as stated to reset in internet options. Been in this situation for weeks and I have a Windows 10. Hopefully hear from you soon thanks.

replies.body: I understand what you are saying but why can I still play in invited games and not go play solo? Is that different?
Thanks, Il go ahead and give it try. Il let you know if it worked or not.

I was the same.

Im windows 10 and tried everything the guide said, and then reinstalled it.

I also downloaded the hextech repair tool and nothing.

I contacted Riot support and a guy named Furio I think helped me through it. I had to disable one of my PC-Protection apps because it went into overdrive and stopped League. Contact Riot support and they'll probably tell you to do the same.
